issue.title: Allow IP address of interface to be changed

content.raw:
The original intent of the implementation was just to keep things as simple as possible, since it was my understanding that the hands would only be operated on the robot. But it appears now that quite a few people are using them off the robot.

One thing I've done in the past on own machines is to use virtual IP addresses, which is pretty easy to do on Linux (just a few lines added to /etc/network/interfaces )
